name: LooseHead Software
overview:
LooseHead Software’s flagship product MobileScore is a mobile application that directly connects a sport with no media to its fans using only a cell phone. A scorekeeper uses their cell phone to feed live scoring, both text and audio play-by-play, photos, and stats to the social networks and cell phones of fans, friends and family.

LooseHead Software is dedicated to improving your quality of life by pushing wireless devices to a whole new level of functionality - - giving you complete mobility. Skyrocketing capabilities of todayâ€™s wireless networks and devices are extending computing and information from the computer to the mobile device. The mobile device is rich player and principal interface in our continuing world of social-connectedness. The mobile-centric focus of LooseHead Software applications bring rich, vibrant interaction to users wherever they are.

Sports are inherently mobile. They occur on fields, in gymnasiums, and at parks and stadiums. Sports are grassroots and people are passionate about them. Nowhere is complete mobility more desired. LooseHeadâ€™s flagship sports application, MobileScore, is the social media platform that enables family, friends, teams, and organizations to stay in contact and share real-time information. MobileScore gives this sports information a vehicle that rides on the technologies upon which we all currently depend: mobile devices, computers, and the Internet.

With MobileScore on your cell phone you can provide your own media; broadcasting LIVE scores, stats, commentary, blogs, and photos to the world. MobileScoreâ€™s patent-pending technology is unbelievably easy to use. Scorekeepers are able to generate rich scoring content with only a few clicks. Fans can use the same application to follow the action in realtime from their mobile device. They can also follow the action on web gadgets/widgets which can be embedded in any website, social network, or blog. Your up-to-the-minute sports info is readily available anywhere, keeping your family, friends, and social networks in the loop. MobileScore is perfect for all sports at all levels of play.
